name: RevisionAndResurfacingProceduresOfHipKnee
title: Revision and Resurfacing Procedures of Hip & Knee
description:
This set of values identifies patients who had revision and resurfacing procedures of hip and knee

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have revision and resurfacing procedures of hip and knee.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Revision of autologous/nonautologous tissue substitute, external/internal fixations, liner, resurfacing device, spacers, synthetic substitute, supplement of acetabulum, femoral shaft, hip, knee, lower femur, patella, upper femur),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial hip/knee replacements, total hip and total knee replacements are excluded.)
